questions.text: Who was the last person to ask Stanley Keyworth if he knew anyone on the plane?
questions.explanation:
President Bartlet.

	President Bartlet was having trouble sleeping so they flew Stanley Keyworth in to help him figure out why he was having trouble. Josh told Stanley the reason why he was asked about the plane was to determine if he told anyone he was coming to the White House.

questions.text: To what President did Queen Victoria give the wood for the Oval Office desk?
questions.explanation:
Rutherford B. Hayes

	The Oval Office desk was made out of wood from the British ship H.M.S. Resolute which was found by the United States after it had been abandoned.

questions.text: The President was in the senior staff meeting when he fell asleep.
questions.explanation:
False.

	On the third night of his sleeplessness, the President took a sleeping pill. It didn't work until he was in a National Security briefing the next morning.

questions.text: Where was Bill Price when he disappeared?
questions.explanation:
Congo.

	Donna told Bill's wife, Janet, that CJ would do everything she could to help find her husband. Later, Josh came to tell them that Bill Price was dead. Donna watched while CJ and Bill's boss, Leonard Wallace, told Janet.

questions.text: What was Toby doing that annoyed Leo?
questions.explanation:
Pacing.

	When Toby stopped pacing, Leo said, "Now the standing still is bothering me a little bit."

questions.text: Where had Ainsley been when she was paged?
questions.explanation:
Social function.

	Ainsley had been at a social function for the Federalist Society, which Sam called a hootenanny.

questions.text: Who was offered a new job while having drinks with a friend?
questions.explanation:
Donna.

	Donna was offered a job with capitolscoop.com as the issues director. Josh told her the only thing he could offer was title bump "Assistant to the Deputy Chief of Staff of Strategic Planning". Donna informed him that she already was.

questions.text: What word did the President tell Stanley he didn't like?
questions.explanation:
Stress.

	The President told Stanley that stress was "something that can be cured with flavored coffee and bath bubbles." He also said that "stress is for other people."

questions.text: What game were Deanna and Charlie playing when she beat him?
questions.explanation:
Basketball.

	Viewers didn't see Deanna and Charlie playing basketball, but Charlie told Sam that his sister beat him at the game.

questions.text: Ainsley told Sam she liked sex.
questions.explanation:
False.

	Ainsley told Celia, the temp, that she liked sex after Celia demeaned the comment that Sam made to Ainsley about how she could make a good dog break his leash.
